abstract.t: This is the ecosystem profile for the Australian CDR describing the composite components to form the technical infrastructure operating to form the Australian Consumer Data Right. This specification is intended to result in a [CDS] compatible implementation. Notational Conventions The keywords "MUST", "MUST NOT", "REQUIRED", "SHALL", "SHALL NOT", "SHOULD", "SHOULD NOT", "RECOMMENDED", "MAY", and "OPTIONAL" in this document are to be interpreted as described in [RFC2119].
